testcase.description:
Test add and remove product in mini cart. **Caution:** Browser window needs to be 1200 pixels wide to show totals subtotal in header.
# 1. Setup and preparation
- Start session, open homepage and delete all visible cookies - Add basic product to cart
# 2. Scope of test
- Validate mini cart header - Validate mini cart header items - Open mini cart body - Validate product inside mini cart body - Validate subtotal inside mini cart body - Remove product from cart - Validate empty cart - Validate empty mini cart
